Package control

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
control.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentForm, CustomerForm, Customers, Login, Menu, Reports, Schedule
public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
The Controller contains methods and attributes useful to other controllers. Other controllers inherit from this class.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public abstract void initialize()
      Initialize method is implemented by all controllers and executes when the controller object is created.

    • formatTime

      public java.lang.String formatTime​(java.time.ZonedDateTime time)

    • changeScene

      protected void changeScene​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, java.lang.String fxmlPath) throws java.io.IOException
      Changes the current scene.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent that triggered the scene change.
      fxmlPath - FXML file to use for the new scene.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • popupScene

      protected void popupScene​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, java.lang.String fxmlPath, java.lang.String title) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a new window, disable focus to the main window while open.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent that triggered the creation of the new window.
      fxmlPath - FXML file for the new window.
      title - Title of new window.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • error

      public void error​(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Creates an error dialog box.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - Message to be displayed in the error box.

    • messageBox

      public void messageBox​(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a dialog box that displays a message to the user.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to display.

    • messageBox

      public void messageBox​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String messageBody)
      Creates a dialog box that displays a message to the user.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to display.
      messageBody - Longer form message.

    • confirm

      public boolean confirm​(java.lang.String confirmMessage)
      Creates a confirmation dialog box.
      Parameters:
      confirmMessage - Message to be displayed in the confirmation box.
      Returns:
      True if the user clicks the ok button, false otherwise.

    • close

      protected void close​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Closes the active window.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent used to get the Window.
